class FunctionsList[source]

sigmoid[source]

sigmoid(x, range, scale)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
x = np.linspace(-5, 5, 11)
range=2
scale=2
y = sigmoid(x, range, scale)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.grid()
plt.xlim(-6, 6)
plt.xlabel('x')
plt.title('expit(x)')
plt.show()
